Sentencas: Planar solid oxide fuel cell anode substrates are exposed to high mechanical loads during assembly, start-up, steady-state operation and thermal cycling.
Titulo: Fracture toughness of solid oxide fuel cell anode substrates determined by a double-torsion technique

Sentencas: Hence, characterization of mechanical stability of anode substrates under different oxidation states and at relevant temperatures is essential to warrant a reliable operation of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Fracture toughness of solid oxide fuel cell anode substrates determined by a double-torsion technique

Sentencas: As a basis for mechanical assessment of brittle supports, two most common anode substrate material variants, NiO-3YSZ and NiO-8YSZ, were analyzed in this study with respect to their fracture toughness at room temperature and at a typical stack operation temperature of 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Fracture toughness of solid oxide fuel cell anode substrates determined by a double-torsion technique

Sentencas: The study considered both, oxidized and reduced materials' states, where also an outlook is given on the behavior of the re-oxidized state that might be induced by malfunctions of sealants or other functional components.
Titulo: Fracture toughness of solid oxide fuel cell anode substrates determined by a double-torsion technique

Sentencas: Aiming at the improvement of material's production, different types of warm pressed and tape cast NiO-8YSZ substrates were characterized in oxidized and reduced states.
Titulo: Fracture toughness of solid oxide fuel cell anode substrates determined by a double-torsion technique

Sentencas: Overall, the results confirmed superior fracture toughness of 3YSZ compared to 8YSZ based composites in the oxidized state, whereas in the reduced state 3YSZ based composites showed similar fracture toughness at room temperature, but a higher value at 800 degrees C compared to 8YSZ based composites.
Titulo: Fracture toughness of solid oxide fuel cell anode substrates determined by a double-torsion technique

Sentencas: Complementary microstructural analysis aided the interpretation of mechanical characterization.
Titulo: Fracture toughness of solid oxide fuel cell anode substrates determined by a double-torsion technique

Fracture toughness of solid oxide fuel cell anode substrates determined by a double-torsion technique
